response.original_title: Sexual Positions for Lovers - Beyond the Missionary Position
response.overview: Join 4 couples as they illustrate 32 lovemaking positions in explicit detail. See special variations on the "rear entry" position and positions using props, like furniture. Learn how to achieve deeper penetration, prolonged intercourse and more satisfying sex, even for those with physical limitations such as back problems, arthritis and pregnancy.
response.title: Sexual Positions for Lovers - Beyond the Missionary Position
